title: Is “influencer” a word? - Quora
tags: English Word Definitions, Terminology, and Jargon

response.answer_text: ‘Influence’: Able to control or manipulate the outcome of certain situations or events, towards ‘a desired option’ – The ability to ‘cause change’ in or of something without any direct or apparent effort. Possessing an inherent authority to affect persons or events, especially authority based on prestige, position, etc. (A person of considerable influence.) ‘Influential’: Referring to a ‘specific individual’ known to possesses ‘specific authority’ in order to guide or manipulate an outcome towards a ‘desired result’.

Influential means something or somebody that yields a lot of influence over the populace.Influencial can be in monetaty terms or in popularity.Influential can also be some that is an idea or a book that rests heavey on your mind.You would say a person who motivates you ,is influential to youbin your life.Influential is a word that describes something or someone of great influence or importance to an individual.🙍
